data.title: Playlist for Sunday, April 28th
data.meta_description: The Folk, Roots, and World Music Show, Sundays 5-7PM Eastern Time on 89.7 FM WTMD, Towson/Baltimore, MD and on wtmd.org
data.text:
Detour Playlist

Paul Hartman

April 28, 2024 5:00PM – 7:00PM

Time, artist, song, album, label, notes

5:00PM Ruth Moody “Already Free” Wanderer [RuthMoody.com] Canada

5:00PM Don Ross, Tony McManus, Beppe Gambetta, Dan Crary “L’Orient est Grand” Live: Men of Steel – The Art of the Steel-String Guitar [Thunderation] Canada/Scotland/Italy/USA

5:00PM Dean Martin “Detour” Houston [Reprise] Opening theme

5:00PM Wayne Brereton “When First Unto This Country” The Robin’s Call [facebook.com/WayneBreretonMusic] Ireland

5:00PM Molsky’s Mountain Drifters “Grey Eagle” Closing the Gap [MountainDrifters.com]

5:00PM Jean Jean Roosevelt “Peyi Mizik” Caribbean Celebration [Putumayo.com] Haiti; Various artists recording

5:00PM Raul Midón “When We Remember” Lost & Found [RaulMidon.com]

5:00PM Billy Bragg “There Will Be a Reckoning” Tooth & Nail [Cooking Vinyl] England

5:00PM Den Fule “Tuss Ola” Lugumleik [Xource] Sweden

5:00PM Coty Hogue “Second Hand News” When We Get to Shore [CotyHogue.com]

5:00PM Fairport Convention “Life’s a Long Song” Who Knows Where the Time Goes? [FairportConvention.com] England

5:00PM Crucial Smith “Lonely Ol’ Night” Crucial Smith [Micah Records]

5:00PM Kris Delmhorst “Just What I Needed” Cars [SignatureSounds.com]

5:00PM Youssou N’Dour et le Super Étoile de Dakar “Immigres” Fatteliku – Live in Athens 1987 [RealWorldRecords.com] Senegal

5:00PM West of Eden “The Ten Bells” Whitechapel [WestOfEden.com] Sweden

5:00PM Clarence White “Black Mountain Blues” 33 Acoustic Guitar Instrumentals [Rural Rhythm]

6:00PM Dolly Parton “Shine” Live and Well [Sugar Hill]

6:00PM The Lonesome Ace Stringband w/The Andrew Collins Trio “May Day” (single) [LonesomeAce.com] Canada

6:00PM Steeleye Span “Padstow” Tempted and Tried [BGO Records] England

6:00PM Oysterband “Hal-An-Tow” Trawler [Cooking Vinyl] England

6:00PM Stan Rogers “Love Can’t Be Bitter All the Time” Songs of a Lifetime [BorealisRecords.com] Canada

6:00PM Vakoka “Aomby Mazava Loha” The Rough Guide to Acoustic Africa [World Music Network] Madagascar; Various artists CD

6:00PM Jabbo Smith’s Rhythm Aces “Sau Sha Stomp” Hot Jazz in the Twenties, Vol. 1 [Biograph]

6:00PM Kate Rusby “Sweet Bride” Sleepless [CompassRecords.com] England

6:00PM Otava Yo “He’s Coming, My Sweetheart” Loud and Clear [ARCMusic.co.uk] Russia

6:00PM Kate Campbell “Rosa’s Coronas/Lanterns on the Levee” Two Nights in Texas [KateCampbell.com]

6:00PM Mark O’Connor “Bowtie” The New Nashville Cats [Warner Bros.]

6:00PM Donna the Buffalo “Your Way Home” Positive Friction [Sugar Hill]

6:00PM Ímar “Be Thou” Avalanche [ImarBand.com] Closing theme; Ireland/Isle of Man/Scotland/England
